level.heading: Rules of construction.
level.text: In accordance with the express terms of this chapter, the following rules of construction will apply in the interpretation of provisions in apparent conflict:
Subchapter II will govern conflicting provisions; and
A parenthetical limitation, upon provisions of a section or subchapter preceding it, shall limit the scope of the section or subchapter to the parenthetical provision.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.
